column4: QUESTION:  How do I see how much battery lifetime my laptop has left?
acpi -V only talks about time until charged; not until discharged
system>power management  then General tab you can click Display battery and you will have an icon in the notification area that you can click and get all that information
what bullgard4 is talking about is also the same thing i am talking about
right click > preferences > History tab then Graph Type .. time to empty
did you mean power history -> laptop battery -> history -> graph type?
right click the battery icon > power history  then look around
time to empty: "There is no data to display"
not for the last 10 minutes, anyways; there is for 2 hours, but that's not what I want
as soon as i unplug my laptop the graph appears.
good for you.  How do I make it appear while the laptop is plugged in?
what do you mean?  It can't be done?
